author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: سُبْحانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ يا إِلهِي أَسْئَلُكَ بِأَصْفِيائِكَ وَأُمَنائِكَ وَبِالَّذِيْ جَعَلْتَهُ خَاتَمَ أَنْبِيائِكَ وَسُفَرائِكَ بِأَنْ تَجْعَلَ ذِكْرَكَ مُؤْنِسِيْ وَحُبَّكَ مَقْصَدِي وَوَجْهَكَ مَطْلَبِيْ وَاسْمَكَ سِرَاجِيْ وَما
translation: Glorified art Thou, O Lord my God! I beseech Thee by Thy Chosen Ones, and by the Bearers of Thy Trust, and by Him Whom Thou hast ordained to be the Seal of Thy Prophets and of Thy Messengers, to let Thy remembrance be my companion, and Thy love my aim, and Thy face my goal, and Thy name my lamp, and Thy wish my desire, and Thy pleasure my delight.
